attributes.action: Make the UK an example to follow via the cutting down of fossil fuel emissions.
attributes.additional_details:
We must reduce the use of fossil fuels urgently, this can be done by replacing them with cleaner/renewable sources. This could include solar, wind power, etc. 
“We need to cut CO2 emissions almost in half (45%) by the end of the next decade,” says Kimberly Nicholas, associate professor of sustainability science at the Lund University Centre for Sustainability Studies (LUCSUS), in Sweden.
attributes.background: Students are constantly put under pressure over exams and qualifications. However these will be worth nothing if we don’t have a world where we can put these to use. Reducing the use of fossil fuels would be catalytic in saving not only the future of the planet but our futures too.
